Description: Weight: fals weight of 30 kharrūba. Seven line Kufic inscription. Fragment; nearly half, bottom and right side. Made of green glass.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (149)
Condition: Fragment; nearly half, bottom and right side.
Associated names: Named in inscription: 'Abd al-Malik b. Marwān
Named in inscription: Yazīd b. Tamīm
